import win32gui

import win32process

import os

from pynput.keyboard import Listener,Key

import ctypes

  

#åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç®¡ç†å‘˜æƒé™

def is_admin():

Â  Â  try:

Â  Â  Â  Â  return ctypes.windll.shell32.IsUserAnAdmin()

Â  Â  except:

Â  Â  Â  Â  return False

  

#ç›‘å¬

def on_release(key):

Â  Â  if key == Key.esc: Â  Â  Â # åœæ­¢ç›‘å¬

Â  Â  Â  Â  return False

Â  Â  if key == Key.f2: Â  Â  Â  # è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æŒ‰f2è°ƒç”¨killå‡½æ•°

Â  Â  Â  Â  kill()

  

#æ€æ­»è¿›ç¨‹

def kill():

Â  Â  now_win = win32gui.GetForegroundWindow()

Â  Â  now_process = win32process.GetWindowThreadProcessId(now_win)[1]

Â  Â  target = r'taskkill /pid {} /F /T'.format(now_process)

Â  Â  os.system(target)

  

#å¼€å§‹åˆ¤æ–­ç®¡ç†å‘˜æƒé™

if is_admin() == False:

Â  Â  print("è­¦å‘Š:å½“å‰éç®¡ç†å‘˜èº«ä»½è¿è¡Œ,å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´killå¤±è´¥")

  

#å¼€å§‹ç›‘å¬

with Listener(

Â  Â  Â  Â  on_release=on_release) as listener:

Â  Â  listener.join()

import pyperclip

from pynput.keyboard import Controller,Listener,Key

import time

  

def paste():

Â  Â  time.sleep(0.2) Â  Â  #æŒ‰ä¸‹åé—´éš”0.2s

Â  Â  i=pyperclip.paste()

Â  Â  keyboard = Controller()

Â  Â  keyboard.type(i)

Â  Â  print("ç²˜è´´æˆåŠŸ"+"\n"+i+"\n")

  

def on_release(key):

Â  Â  if key == Key.esc: Â  Â  Â # åœæ­¢ç›‘å¬

Â  Â  Â  Â  return False

Â  Â  if key == Key.f2: Â  Â  Â  # è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æŒ‰f2è°ƒç”¨ç²˜è´´å‡½æ•°

Â  Â  Â  Â  paste()

  

with Listener(

Â  Â  Â  Â  on_release=on_release) as listener:

Â  Â  listener.join()
